pr_title: NXP-29833: check ACL name is not null on creation

timeline.message: NXP-29833: throw a NuxeoException on creating ACLs with null name

timeline.bodyText:
There should be a space before ( and around ==.
But instead of these 3 lines please use Objects.requireNonNull(name, "ACL name can't be null"). It won't throw a NuxeoException but that's not a problem for this kind of check. Unit test will need to be updated of course.
timeline.author: efge

timeline.bodyText:
Please assert on the message of the exception too:
assertEquals("ACL name can't be null", e.getMessage());
